Versatile Solutions

Video Wall Controller Applications

Our controllers deliver exceptional performance across various environments, providing seamless control and management for all display scenarios

Corporate

Create immersive experiences in corporate lobbies, boardrooms, and conference centers with seamless control

Control Rooms

Monitor critical operations with high-definition video walls for 24/7 reliability and instant information access

Retail

Engage customers with dynamic visual displays and interactive shopping experiences across multiple screens

Command Centers

Coordinate emergency response with real-time data visualization and centralized display management

Key Benefits

Controller Highlights

Experience the next generation of display management with our cutting-edge controller features

01

Excellent splicing performance

High-performance video wall controller offering seamless splicing and superior image quality across multiple displays.

02

Flexible roaming experience

Dynamic window management allowing content to be freely moved and positioned across the entire video wall.

03

Open windows freely

Intuitive multi-window support enabling simultaneous display of various content sources.

04

Picture in picture

Advanced PiP functionality allowing overlay of multiple video sources with customizable positioning and sizing.

Roaming: the window can be dragged to anywhere in the screen.
